title: NOW LEASING – Gorgeous 2 Bedroom Apt at The Legends at Berry!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'Deeply Affordable Apartments At Almost $550 Less Than Nearby Communities!', 'HURRY – our new rent-restricted apartments are going fast!', 'Submit your application paperwork quickly and easily today to reserve your brand-new home!', 'Discover your new home at Legends at Berry!', 'Located in St Paul, MN, The Legends at Berry is a transit-friendly site conveniently situated near a plethora of wonderful dining, shopping, and entertainment options.', 'Offering gorgeous and open 1, 2, & 3 bedroom apartment homes, The Legends at Berry provides its residents with both quality and affordable living.', 'Each apartment comes with an in-home washer & dryer unit, roomy walk-in closets, a private patio or balcony space, central heating & air conditioning and MORE!', 'Here at The Legends at Berry you will find an endless amount of amenities you deserve!', 'From a beautifully landscaped courtyard space & picnic areas to an indoor beauty salon, theater room, and a huge community room, there truly is something for everyone.', 'Do not wait any longer, lease today and have the privilege of calling The Legends at Berry your home!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Convenient Hallway Linen Closet', '- Community Kitchen', '- Soaring Windows', '- On-Site Fitness Center', '- Grilling & Picnic Areas', '- Roomy Walk-In Closet(s)', 'We are a pet-friendly community.', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'The Legends at Berry is a 62+ community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'At lease one household member must be 62 years or older (+ any/all additional household members must be 18 years or older).', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380 | 5 Occupants: $76,020 | 6', 'Occupants: $81,660.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:', 'show contact info', 'The Legends at Berry 62+ Apartments', '777 Berry Street', 'St. Paul, MN, 55114', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'cjNy1bnpp2hA']
